description: Attorney General Jeff Sessions on Tuesday sent a letter to the Department of Homeland Security recommending an end to Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals, or DACA, the Obama-era executive action that shields young undocumented immigrants from deportation.
title: Read Jeff Sessions’s Letter Advising an End to DACA
title_page: Read Jeff Sessions’s Letter Advising an End to DACA - The New York Times
